text: Roshan Shrestha is a Nepali journalist and digital media worker. He is known for founding the online news website Khoj Samachar, which has received recognition in Nepal for its unique voice in digital journalism.वैकल्पिक आवाज बनेको ‘खोज समाचार’, डिजिटल पत्रकारितामा फरक पहिचान. Krishna Saron Online. 15 May 2025.रोशन श्रेष्ठको पत्रकारिता यात्रा, खोज समाचारको स्थापना देखि नयाँलाई बढी प्राथमिकता दिएको आरोप सम्म. RatoPati. 22 September 2023. He also worked as a media coordinator at the National Cardiac Center in Kathmandu.Roshan Shrestha. National Cardiac Centre. Retrieved 26 May 2025. Shrestha creates journalistic and multimedia content focusing on health, civic issues, and youth awareness. His work mainly targets younger audiences in Nepal.रोशन श्रेष्ठको पत्रकारिता यात्रा : ‘कन्टेन्ट क्रिएटरदेखि खोज समाचारको स्थापनासम्म. OurBiratnagar.net. 10 May 2025.Journalist Roshan Shrestha’s Khoj Samachar: A Rising Voice in Nepal’s Independent Digital Media. Nepali News Hub. 13 May 2025.रोशन श्रेष्ठले सुरु गरे ‘खोज समाचार’ नामक अनलाइन मिडिया. Chautari Post Online. 4 September 2021.Khoj Samachar Marks Third Anniversary as a Distinct Voice in Nepali Journalism. Global Online Television. 7 May 2025.सामाजिक सञ्जालमा उदाहरणीय बन्दै रोशन. Kalakarmi. 1 November 2023. In 2025, he launched a mobile app under his name. The app helps users check foreign job-related documents like visas and offer letters.पत्रकार श्रेष्ठले लन्च गरे आफ्नै नामको एप. News24 Nepal. 16 March 2025.पत्रकार श्रेष्ठद्वारा मोबाइल एप्लिकेशन लन्च, वैदेशिक रोजगारीमा जाने युवाहरूलाई विशेष सुविधा. Terai Online. 26 May 2025.‘रोशन श्रेष्ठ’: सूचना, जिज्ञासा र समस्या समाधानको प्रयास. Sidhakura. 14 March 2025. In May 2025, Similarweb reported that the app ranked number six in the "News & Magazines" category on the Google Play Store in Nepal.Similarweb - Top News & Magazines Apps in Nepal. Similarweb. Retrieved 26 May 2025.नेपालमा निर्माण गरिएको समाचार एप SimilarWeb को सूचीमा टप १० मा.
